waaay better than Anonymous, but not as fast in releasing
I think the subtitles for the episode are done well and the closing song is cool because the subtitles are in different colours
Good job. Especially how the file is small. Just too slow... T_T
Bad Comments: Well done subs and you have to love the small file size.

Good Comments: Because they finished the work. I love them for it. All 12 episodes; they have my eternal gratitude. ^-^
Good Quality as expected from A-E Saizen.

Amazing subs giving detailed points and great quality
Bad Comments: Very good sub in almost all aspects.
Finally complete, that's enough for me.
Good video and audio quality, great subs, fancy notes and perfect typesetting. But you may find the subtitles big.
Compared to the official translation, there is so many mistakes in their releases...
Quality subs by AE and Saizen, they used honorifics and had TL notes.
very nice. they include both the uncut and cut version in the file.
